text: "I See the Want To in Your Eyes" is a 1974 song by Conway Twitty. It was first recorded by singer Gary Stewart. It was taken from his 1975 album Out of Hand. Twitty's version was taken from his 31st studio album I'm Not Through Loving You Yet. It topped the country single charts in the United States and Canada. Category:1974 songs Category:Country songs Category:Conway Twitty songs
title: I See the Want To in Your Eyes
